title: Angular Workspace Options Schema
description: Initializes an empty workspace and adds the necessary dependencies required by an Angular application.

newProjectRoot.description: The path where new projects will be created.

version.description: The version of the Angular CLI to use.

minimal.description: Create a workspace without any testing frameworks. (Use for learning purposes only.)

strict.description: Create a workspace with stricter type checking options. This setting helps improve maintainability and catch bugs ahead of time. For more information, see https://angular.io/strict

packageManager.description: The package manager used to install dependencies.
